LanguageData.CMC_GunColorPickerDesciption: You can customise CeleTech weapons' camouflage color by clicking a color and a pawn equipping a CeleTech gun as main weapon.\nsome weapons are not customisable.
LanguageData.MessageMustSelectCMCGun: select PAWN equipped with CeleTech weapon
LanguageData.Message_AESASetUp: The deployment of the "Kunlun" AESA radar is complete, and the anti-tank missile turret will gain automatic attack capability.
LanguageData.Message_Destroyed: The "Kunlun" AESA radar has been shut down, and the anti-tank missile turret will lose its automatic attack capability.
LanguageData.StatEnergyWeaponDMG_Text: damage caused by an energy pulse:{0}\n
LanguageData.StatShootNum_Text: Salvo size of this mounted weapon is{0}, ammo consumption is also multiplies by this value.
LanguageData.Message_MissileLostTarget: A missile lost its intended target.
LanguageData.Message_CMC_TraderCantLanded: UTS is unable to land, leaving. You need at least one powered and cleared landing platform.
LanguageData.Stat_CMCDMGDrange_Text: Projectile damage and penetration attenuation starts from:{0}\nDamage: Inverse-square decay\nPenetration: Inverse-cube decay
LanguageData.CMC.ScanMapDesc: Utilizes Kunlun radar to illuminate designated AO, enabling long-range artillery and cruise missiles to autonomously engage hostile targets within the zone.
LanguageData.CMC.ScanMapStopDescDefault: Radar illumination terminated in current AO.
LanguageData.CMC_Targeting: Kunlun radar providing real-time fire control data for AO {0}. Hostile target tracking active.
LanguageData.CMC_TargetingDefault: Kunlun radar providing real-time fire control data for current AO. Hostile target tracking active.
LanguageData.CMC.ScanMapFailed: Fire control request denied. Non-hostile faction signature detected in AO. IFF verification failed.
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTargetMapFromWorld: switch to Low-Voltage Direct Fire Mode
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTarggetMapFromWorldDesc: Current: Indirect Fire (attacks radar-locked map tile targets). After switching: Attacks in-map targets.\n\nMagnetic rails fully charged to accelerate projectiles to first cosmic velocity. Turret cooling and auto-loading systems operating at full power.
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTargetWorldFromMap: switch to High-Voltage Indirect Fire Mode
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTarggetWorldFromMapDesc: Current: Direct Fire (attacks in-map targets). After switching: Attacks radar-locked map tile targets.\n\nMagnetic rails partially charged. All turret subsystems operating in low-power mode.
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTargetWorldFromMap: Switch to Low-Voltage Direct Fire Mode
LanguageData.CMC_CommandTarggetWorldFromMapDesc: Current: Indirect Fire (attacks radar-locked map tile targets). After switching: Attacks in-map targets.\n\nMagnetic rails fully charged. All turret subsystems operating in high-power mode.
LanguageData.Command_CMC_AutoReleaseUAV_Desc: if toggled, floating guns will auto release in combat, but they cannot automatically return to hanger.
LanguageData.CMC_UAVGizmoB: energy stored in capacitor array, consume inflight.
LanguageData.CMC_FailedToWear_ExceedNumLimit: Unable to equip, floating guns reach maximum bandwidth.
LanguageData.Command_CMCUAVDrawRadiusDesc: Render floating guns'attack radius, may cause lagging. Turn off if large number of active floating guns existed.
